name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Accomplished Senior Release Engineer with 9+ years of experience in CI/CD processes, utilizing tools such as **Bitrise**, **GitHub Actions**, **CircleCI**, and **GitHub Runners**. Proficient in version control through **Git workflows** and adept in scripting with **Bash** to automate development practices. Extensive knowledge of **semantic versioning**, and deployment strategies for mobile and web applications, including tools like **Fastlane** and **Xcode**. Well-versed in managing application releases and features through **LaunchDarkly**, with a strong background in using **Gradle** and navigating **Play Console** for efficient app distribution. Deep expertise in frontend and backend development, particularly with **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, **ReactJS**, and **NextJS**, together with core knowledge of **.NET** and **C#**. Proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions, optimizing release cycles, and enhancing collaboration across multifunctional teams while leading projects to successful outcomes.
